content:
Yes, there are several free guided meditation apps that can be helpful for managing anxiety disorders. Here are a few options:

1. Insight Timer: This app offers over 60,000 free guided meditations, mindfulness exercises, and talks in multiple languages. 2. Smiling Mind: This is a free, non-profit meditation app that provides guided meditations designed for children, teens, and adults. 3. MyLife Meditation: This app offers free daily meditation sessions, as well as personalized meditations based on your needs. 4. Stop, Breathe & Think: This app offers a selection of free guided meditation exercises to help manage anxiety, stress, and depression. 5. Aware: This free meditation app offers guided meditations, as well as a timer for silent meditation sessions. All of the above apps offer free content but may also have premium paid features. However, the free options are usually sufficient for most people to develop a regular meditation practice.
